description:
Is there reason for hope for a solution to becoming overwhelmed as an author? The short answer is “YES”. This course is about time management, becoming organized and staying on top of the game to become profitable Indie Authors.

The course comprises 6 Sections, which contain video lectures, pod casts and PDF documents to print and make notes.

As the creator and author of "The ePubWealth Program," Leland teaches up-and-coming authors the ins-and-outs of today's ePublishing world. He has assisted hundreds of authors make it big in the ePublishing world. Leland also created a series of external book promotion programs and teaches authors how to promote their books using external marketing sources.

You will get a huge amount of guidance, marketing tips, dos and don’ts, how to stay on top of the game, as well as amazing resources to help you to become a profitable Indie Author.
title: The Overwhelmed Author - Time Management for all Authors
